message: Let's split it 50/50 and call it a day!
You can't get out of this deal that easily!
You're not getting the whole pie, Bob! But I'll give you a better deal this time.
You're getting closer to getting out of this deal, but I'm not done yet!
You're getting greedy, Bob! I'll give you a slightly better deal, but don't think you're getting away with everything!
You're getting closer to the middle, but I'm not going to let you get the better end of the deal just yet!
You're getting desperate, Bob! I'll give you a decent deal, but don't expect any more favors!
You're getting closer to the sweet spot, Alice. Time to meet me halfway!
